column4: Im trying to mount a samba share from my server on my ubuntu desktop. On the server, I have it setup so ONLY guest can access the share so there should be NO file owner/groups whatever so that anyone can edit the share. When I mount it using mount.cifs it shows all the actual file permissions instead of nothing
I can access/edit everyhting in windows
im having an issue with samba as well. u ever have where windows tries to access \\HOSTNAMEhostname
